name: removeDeviceFromRoom
shortDescription: Removes a device from a room
description: This method removes a device from a room.

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer to remove from the room.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The ID of the room as returned by createRoom() or getRooms().

returnValue: Returns true on success and false on errors (e. g. unknown channel).
